reviews.review_msg: Lectures were always behind and tedious. Quizzes in class are easy, but I don't understand why they make you write another quiz in tutorials, even though each lecture is a week behind. TA is also nasty. She was always rude towards her students. Every single day, she wakes up and chooses violence.
Makes interesting material super boring. The class is very writing heavy and research based. He expects you to read a lot of papers for assignments and tutorials. Rambles a lot in lectures
the content was very interesting however lectures were a bit boring at times. the weekly quizzes were difficult but didn't count too much towards grade. overall an average class

Not sure what people are talking about here. As a business student, I enjoyed his class. It was interesting material but he was a bit dry. Testing is fair and no curveballs. Study the material and you can get a good mark. Hes pretty fair with his assignments and tests and doesnt pile on the work unnecessarily. No group projects which is a bonus.
This prof literally wants to gatekeep GPAs and makes a very easy course extra tricky and hard. In addition, the lectures were very boring. Do not recommend him, makes BPK 140 boring.

DO NOT TAKE HIS CLASS, my friend had taken BPK 140 in the past and said it was easy and a GPA booster, BUT THIS MANZ IS TERRIBLE. he is a super hard grader and makes lectures soo dry. Like I want to be nice to him, but i just cant.

He literally wants you to fail. Worst teacher I have ever had. Makes things unnecessarily hard and tests you on irrelevant and super minute things so it makes studying a nightmare. His exams are not given enough time and most of the students arent able to finish on time. He makes interesting this suuuper boring. Overall do not recommend.

Makes the interesting material extremely boring and makes every questions a trick and confusing. Memorize everything from every slide because he will quiz and test you on the most random and pointless parts of the material.
